classes.name: Warrior
classes.description: Proud and honorable, specialising in brute strength. Primary stats are strength and constitution.

classes.name: Mage
classes.description: Trained in the arcane arts and proficient with all forms of magic. Primary stat is intelligence.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: Unscrupulous and underhanded, strikes from the shadows. Primary stats are dexterity and initiative.
